titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the University of Michigan Spring commencement 2010 [videorecording] live at the Big House / commencement speaker: U.S. President Barack Obama.

did.unittitle: University of Michigan Spring commencement 2010 [videorecording] live at the Big House / commencement speaker: U.S. President Barack Obama.

odd.head: Publication, Distribution, Etc.
odd.p: [Ann Arbor, Mich] : Regents of the University of Michigan, c2010.

odd.head: Varying Form of Title
odd.p: Title from disc label: University of Michigan 2010 Spring commencement : speaker: President Barack Obama

odd.head: Participant or Performer
odd.p: Commencement address, President Barack Obama ; Governor's greeting, Jennifer Granholm ; President's statement and interview, Mary Sue Coleman ; student's remarks and interview, Alex Marston ; Athletic Director interview, David Brandon.

archdesc.scopecontent: "On May 1, 2010, more than 85,000 people gathered in Michigan Stadium for the Commencement of the University of Michigan class of 2010. At the height of the colorful program of music, ceremony, and speeches, President Barack Obama delivered the Commencement address, challenging graduates to keep the nation's democracy going -- calling for greater civility in public discourse, active participation in the democratic process, and recognition of the important role of government in people's lives. This commemorative video showcases the ceremony and spectacle of the event, which was, for the first time, broadcast live on the Big ten Network."--Container.
